translations: n.[陶瓷] 素瓷；浓汤；橘黄色

sentences.sentence: Strain soups, bisques or sauces, extract fruit pulp or separate fibres from vegetables. ;
sentences.translation: 将蔬果中的纤维剔除，用来制作浓汤，调味酱汤；

sentences.sentence: The machine produces juice, fruit purees, vegetable mousses, sauce bases, bisques and fish soups.
sentences.translation: 将蔬果中的纤维剔除，用来制作浓汤，调味酱汤；
